RemediationStrings.Title: This machine is not a Dell.
RemediationStrings.Description: We only support Dell devices, please contact us for more information.

RemediationStrings.Title: Insufficient RAM.
RemediationStrings.Description: Please arrange for your machine to be replaced, or RAM upgraded to 8Gb Minimum

RemediationStrings.Title: Unsupported Application Detected
RemediationStrings.Description: Steam has been detected on your device, please uninstall and try again.
